text.text: Welcome to Blockbench 4.5 - The FBX Update!
FBX Export, new features for Minecraft: Java Edition models, and much more!

features.title: Predicate Editor
features.text: Select models in your Minecraft Java resource pack to override the current item when certain conditions are met.

features.title: FBX Export
features.text: Export FBX model files and use them for rendering or for games in Unreal Engine and Unity!

features.title: Face Properties Editor
features.text: View and edit face properties like texture and tint all in one place!
